workData.title: Multi-Tenant Survey CXM SaaS
workData.tech: SaaS Architecture, Laravel, Livewire, Node.js, Python
workData.description: Designed and deployed 10+ multi-tenant instances for major enterprise clients including Edelweiss, LTFS, and NPCI. Built a centralized engine for high-concurrency survey management with real-time analytics.

workData.title: Lead Management System
workData.description: Implemented an automated patient lead tracking system with custom schedulers and integrated SMS/Email reminders to boost conversion rates.

workData.title: Mustache Room Booking
workData.description: End-to-end room reservation system featuring seamless third-party payment integration and dynamic pricing logic for hospitality management.

workData.title: ERP: Gemstone Manufacturing
workData.description: A comprehensive enterprise solution monitoring gem production from raw stone procurement to final global sales and inventory tracking.
